lead_paragraph: If Democrats pull off some Senate upsets, or win a few more close races than the pundits expect, this may be why.
snippet: In a year when public sentiment is squarely against them, Democrats are hoping that well-funded, sophisticated voter turnout efforts will help them win.

headline.main: Democrats Pin Hopes on Turnout Effort

abstract: In a year when public sentiment is squarely against them, Democrats are hoping that well-funded, sophisticated voter turnout efforts will help them win.
